CONFLICT.title: Version Conflict
CONFLICT.description: Someone else updated this item. Your changes werenâ€™t saved. Please try again.

tooltips.datetime: Enter the date in one of these formats: [YYYY-MM-DD], [YYYY-MM], or [YYYY].
tooltips.fixed: This field must contain at least one character.
tooltips.guid: Globally unique identifier (GUID) in the standard [G] format.
tooltips.bit32: This can be a 10-digit decimal ([D:10]) or an 8-digit hexadecimal ([X:8]).
tooltips.bit20: This can be a 7-digit decimal [D:7] or a 5-digit hexadecimal [X:5].
tooltips.digit9: You can use [D] or [D:N], where N represents the total number of digits, including leading zeros.
tooltips.digit6: You can use [D] or [D:N], where N represents the total number of digits, including leading zeros.
tooltips.sequence: You can use [D] or [D:N], where N represents the total number of digits, including leading zeros.

errors.field-limit: The number of fields is exhausted
errors.unique-error: Least one field should contain unique type: GUID, SEQUNCE, BIT32, BIT20, DIGIT6, DIGIT9
errors.datetime: Datetime field must use following format: [YYYY-MM-DD], [YYYY-MM], or [YYYY]
errors.fixed: Fixed field must use at least one character.
errors.bit32: 32-Bit field must use following format: decimal [D:10] or hex [X:8]
errors.bit20: 20-Bit field must use following format: decimal [D:7] or hex [X:5]
errors.digit6: 6-Digit field must use following format [D] or [D:N]. N is leading zeros.
errors.digit9: 9-Digit field must use following format [D] or [D:N]. N is leading zeros.
errors.sequence: Sequence field must use following format [D] or [D:N]. N is leading zeros.
